headline.print_headline: Greater Use Of Vaccine For Infection Is Urged
headline.main: Greater Use of Vaccine for Infection Is Urged

docs.lead_paragraph: Bacterial infections, for which there is an underused treatment, can be a common and sometimes deadly swine flu complication.
docs.snippet: Bacterial infections, for which there is an underused treatment, can be a common and sometimes deadly swine flu complication.
